title: Exclusive: Comcast readies bid for 21st Century Fox
text:
Exclusive: Comcast readies bid for 21st Century Fox 00:51
Comcast is speaking to investment banks about obtaining bridge financing for an all-cash bid to displace Walt Disney on its $52 billion deal to acquire most of Twenty-First Century Fox assets, three people familiar with the matter said on Monday.
Comcast is speaking to investment banks about obtaining bridge financing for an all-cash bid to displace Walt Disney on its $52 billion deal to acquire most of Twenty-First Century Fox assets, three people familiar with the matter said on Monday. //reut.rs/2rxrSj1
